/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that rise in the background. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the gray of the buildings.
